client_logic.text:
So, kid you are hot for fight the centurie!.
I just spotted a small army group.

"I will bust the centurie"

Alors petit tu est chaud pour combattre de la centurie !.
J'ai justement repéré un petit groupe armée.

"Je vais les casser en deux"
The Centuria is just before the road 8 in grass
La centurie ce trouve juste avant la route 8, dans les herbes

Who are you asking me to stop using my contact
Learns to shut up.
Ok I see, before launch the assault I need more information
I would need evidence and the list of people involved.
Underground lair you said, I can have a great idea.

Good job kid
You learn quickly.
Now we can move on to the serious stuff with you.
